conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully converts a complex 2D plan into a clean 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness representation. Lighting is slightly flat but shadows help define the volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to room configuration; however, the window seat/bay window detail on the right side is simplified into a flat wall section.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen counters and basic bathroom fixtures are present, but the detailed 'Utility Room' layout is mostly empty space.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. No UI text or overlapping artifacts. Structural elements are very readable.

detected_errors.description: The faceted window seat geometry in the dining area is missing, rendered as a straight wall.
Simplified or missing interior equipment in the utility room compared to the detailed plan.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that maintains spatial logic, though it misses specific exterior architectural facets like the bay window seat.
